nodes.text: A holoplacard was a type of art. The Rodian artist Zyk-yadoon created a holoplacard that depicted the Jedi Master Ood Bnar during the Battle of Ossus. The holoplacard was hung in the museum Remembrance Hall on the planet Almas and it was destroyed in about 31 BBY, when the musuem was attacked by the Believers.
